meanings.definition: To form or cause to form small rounded protrusions on the surface of a cell.
meanings.sent1: The cell was blebbing due to the stress it experienced.
meanings.sent2: Cells often start blebbing when they undergo certain changes.
meanings.sent3: The blebbing cell looked like it was trying to grow tiny bubbles.
meanings.sent4: Under the microscope, the blebbing process resembled tiny balloons forming on the cell.
meanings.sent5: The blebbing action of the cell was like popcorn popping inside it.

meanings.definition: A small rounded protrusion on the surface of a cell.
meanings.sent1: I observed a blebbing on the cell membrane during the experiment.
meanings.sent2: The scientist pointed out the blebbing on the cell in the diagram.
meanings.sent3: The blebbing on the cell looked like a tiny bump trying to escape.
meanings.sent4: The blebbing on the cell was like a small bubble waiting to burst.
meanings.sent5: The blebbing on the cell's surface made it look like a mini mountain range.
